    Chooses which card to take from an offer.
    chooseCard(Offer) - Method in class strategy.HumanStrategy

    chooseCard(Offer) - Method in interface strategy.PlayStrategy
    Chooses which card to take from an offer.
    chooseCard(Offer) - Method in class strategy.typestrategy.DefensiveStrategy
    Takes the face-up card (predictable choice).
    chooseCard(Offer) - Method in class strategy.typestrategy.OffensiveStrategy
    Always takes the face-up card (greedy approach).
    chooseOffer(Player) - Method in class strategy.AIStrategy
    Creates an offer from the player's hand.
    chooseOffer(Player) - Method in class strategy.HumanStrategy
    Creates an offer by asking the user which card to place face-down.
    chooseOffer(Player) - Method in interface strategy.PlayStrategy
    Creates an offer from the player's hand.
    chooseOffer(Player) - Method in class strategy.typestrategy.DefensiveStrategy
    Creates an offer by hiding the higher value card.
    chooseOffer(Player) - Method in class strategy.typestrategy.OffensiveStrategy
    Creates an offer by hiding the lower value card.
    clearHand() - Method in class base.Player
    Clears all cards from the player's hand.
    close() - Static method in class base.InputHandler
